nodes.text: CryonCorp was a manufacturer of personal scanning devices during the last few decades of the Galactic Republic. One of their products was the EnhanceScan general-purpose scanner. During the Galactic Civil War, CryonCorp supported the Rebel Alliance and allied itself with Bail Organa, supplying the Rebellion with technology. CryonCorp remained the New Republic's foremost supplier of scanning devices and sensor equipment.
